source/include/boost/config/auto_link.hpp

00001 //  (C) Copyright John Maddock 2003.
00002 //  Use, modification and distribution are subject to the
00003 //  Boost Software License, Version 1.0. (See accompanying file
00004 //  LICENSE_1_0.txt or copy at http://www.boost.org/LICENSE_1_0.txt)
00005 
00006  /*
00007   *   LOCATION:    see http://www.boost.org for most recent version.
00008   *   FILE         auto_link.hpp
00009   *   VERSION      see <boost/version.hpp>
00010   *   DESCRIPTION: Automatic library inclusion for Borland/Microsoft compilers.
00011   */
00012 
00013 /*************************************************************************
00014 
00015 USAGE:
00016 ~~~~~~
00017 
00018 Before including this header you must define one or more of define the following macros:
00019 
00020 BOOST_LIB_NAME:       Required: A string containing the basename of the library,
00021                       for example boost_regex.
00022 BOOST_DYN_LINK:       Optional: when set link to dll rather than static library.
00023 BOOST_LIB_DIAGNOSTIC: Optional: when set the header will print out the name
00024                       of the library selected (useful for debugging).
00025 
00026 These macros will be undef'ed at the end of the header, further this header
00027 has no include guards - so be sure to include it only once from your library!
00028 
00029 Algorithm:
00030 ~~~~~~~~~~
00031 
00032 Libraries for Borland and Microsoft compilers are automatically
00033 selected here, the name of the lib is selected according to the following
00034 formula:
00035 
00036 BOOST_LIB_PREFIX
00037    + BOOST_LIB_NAME
00038    + "_"
00039    + BOOST_LIB_TOOLSET
00040    + BOOST_LIB_THREAD_OPT
00041    + BOOST_LIB_RT_OPT
00042    "-"
00043    + BOOST_LIB_VERSION
00044 
00045 These are defined as:
00046 
00047 BOOST_LIB_PREFIX:     "lib" for static libraries otherwise "".
00048 
00049 BOOST_LIB_NAME:       The base name of the lib ( for example boost_regex).
00050 
00051 BOOST_LIB_TOOLSET:    The compiler toolset name (vc6, vc7, bcb5 etc).
00052 
00053 BOOST_LIB_THREAD_OPT: "-mt" for multithread builds, otherwise nothing.
00054 
00055 BOOST_LIB_RT_OPT:     A suffix that indicates the runtime library used,
00056                       contains one or more of the following letters after
00057                       a hiphen:
00058 
00059                       s      static runtime (dynamic if not present).
00060                       d      debug build (release if not present).
00061                       g      debug/diagnostic runtime (release if not present).
00062                       p      STLPort Build.
00063 
00064 BOOST_LIB_VERSION:    The Boost version, in the form x_y, for Boost version x.y.
00065 
00066 
00067 ***************************************************************************/
00068 
00069 #ifdef __cplusplus
00070 #  ifndef BOOST_CONFIG_HPP
00071 #     include <boost/config.hpp>
00072 #  endif
00073 #elif defined(_MSC_VER) && !defined(__MWERKS__) && !defined(__EDG_VERSION__)
00074 //
00075 // C language compatability (no, honestly)
00076 //
00077 #  define BOOST_MSVC _MSC_VER
00078 #  define BOOST_STRINGIZE(X) BOOST_DO_STRINGIZE(X)
00079 #  define BOOST_DO_STRINGIZE(X) #X
00080 #endif
00081 //
00082 // Only include what follows for known and supported compilers:
00083 //
00084 #if (defined(BOOST_MSVC) && defined(_MSC_EXTENSIONS)) \
00085     || defined(__BORLANDC__) \
00086     || (defined(__MWERKS__) && defined(_WIN32) && (__MWERKS__ >= 0x3000)) \
00087     || (defined(__ICL) && defined(_MSC_EXTENSIONS) && (_MSC_VER >= 1200))
00088 
00089 #ifndef BOOST_VERSION_HPP
00090 #  include <boost/version.hpp>
00091 #endif
00092 
00093 #ifndef BOOST_LIB_NAME
00094 #  error "Macro BOOST_LIB_NAME not set (internal error)"
00095 #endif
00096 
00097 //
00098 // error check:
00099 //
00100 #if defined(__MSVC_RUNTIME_CHECKS) && !defined(_DEBUG)
00101 #  pragma message("Using the /RTC option without specifying a debug runtime will lead to linker errors")
00102 #  pragma message("Hint: go to the code generation options and switch to one of the debugging runtimes")
00103 #  error "Incompatible build options"
00104 #endif
00105 //
00106 // select toolset:
00107 //
00108 #if defined(BOOST_MSVC) && (BOOST_MSVC == 1200)
00109 
00110    // vc6:
00111 #  define BOOST_LIB_TOOLSET "vc6"
00112 
00113 #elif defined(BOOST_MSVC) && (BOOST_MSVC == 1300)
00114 
00115    // vc7:
00116 #  define BOOST_LIB_TOOLSET "vc7"
00117 
00118 #elif defined(BOOST_MSVC) && (BOOST_MSVC >= 1310)
00119 
00120    // vc71:
00121 #  define BOOST_LIB_TOOLSET "vc71"
00122 
00123 #elif defined(__BORLANDC__)
00124 
00125    // CBuilder 6:
00126 #  define BOOST_LIB_TOOLSET "bcb"
00127 
00128 #elif defined(__ICL)
00129 
00130    // Intel C++, no version number:
00131 #  define BOOST_LIB_TOOLSET "iw"
00132 
00133 #elif defined(__MWERKS__) && (__MWERKS__ <= 0x31FF )
00134 
00135    // Metrowerks CodeWarrior 8.x
00136 #  define BOOST_LIB_TOOLSET "cw8"
00137 
00138 #elif defined(__MWERKS__) && (__MWERKS__ <= 0x32FF )
00139 
00140    // Metrowerks CodeWarrior 9.x
00141 #  define BOOST_LIB_TOOLSET "cw9"
00142 
00143 #endif
00144 
00145 //
00146 // select thread opt:
00147 //
00148 #if defined(_MT) || defined(__MT__)
00149 #  define BOOST_LIB_THREAD_OPT "-mt"
00150 #else
00151 #  define BOOST_LIB_THREAD_OPT
00152 #endif
00153 
00154 #if defined(_MSC_VER) || defined(__MWERKS__)
00155 
00156 #  ifdef _DLL
00157 
00158 #     if (defined(__SGI_STL_PORT) || defined(_STLPORT_VERSION)) && (defined(_STLP_OWN_IOSTREAMS) || defined(__STL_OWN_IOSTREAMS))
00159 
00160 #        if defined(_DEBUG) && (defined(__STL_DEBUG) || defined(_STLP_DEBUG))
00161 #            define BOOST_LIB_RT_OPT "-gdp"
00162 #        elif defined(_DEBUG)
00163 #            define BOOST_LIB_RT_OPT "-gdp"
00164 #            pragma message("warning: STLPort debug versions are built with /D_STLP_DEBUG=1")
00165 #            error "Build options aren't compatible with pre-built libraries"
00166 #        else
00167 #            define BOOST_LIB_RT_OPT "-p"
00168 #        endif
00169 
00170 #     elif defined(__SGI_STL_PORT) || defined(_STLPORT_VERSION)
00171 
00172 #        if defined(_DEBUG) && (defined(__STL_DEBUG) || defined(_STLP_DEBUG))
00173 #            define BOOST_LIB_RT_OPT "-gdpn"
00174 #        elif defined(_DEBUG)
00175 #            define BOOST_LIB_RT_OPT "-gdpn"
00176 #            pragma message("warning: STLPort debug versions are built with /D_STLP_DEBUG=1")
00177 #            error "Build options aren't compatible with pre-built libraries"
00178 #        else
00179 #            define BOOST_LIB_RT_OPT "-pn"
00180 #        endif
00181 
00182 #     else
00183 
00184 #        if defined(_DEBUG)
00185 #            define BOOST_LIB_RT_OPT "-gd"
00186 #        else
00187 #            define BOOST_LIB_RT_OPT
00188 #        endif
00189 
00190 #     endif
00191 
00192 #  else
00193 
00194 #     if (defined(__SGI_STL_PORT) || defined(_STLPORT_VERSION)) && (defined(_STLP_OWN_IOSTREAMS) || defined(__STL_OWN_IOSTREAMS))
00195 
00196 #        if defined(_DEBUG) && (defined(__STL_DEBUG) || defined(_STLP_DEBUG))
00197 #            define BOOST_LIB_RT_OPT "-sgdp"
00198 #        elif defined(_DEBUG)
00199 #             define BOOST_LIB_RT_OPT "-sgdp"
00200 #            pragma message("warning: STLPort debug versions are built with /D_STLP_DEBUG=1")
00201 #            error "Build options aren't compatible with pre-built libraries"
00202 #        else
00203 #            define BOOST_LIB_RT_OPT "-sp"
00204 #        endif
00205 
00206 #     elif defined(__SGI_STL_PORT) || defined(_STLPORT_VERSION)
00207 
00208 #        if defined(_DEBUG) && (defined(__STL_DEBUG) || defined(_STLP_DEBUG))
00209 #            define BOOST_LIB_RT_OPT "-sgdpn"
00210 #        elif defined(_DEBUG)
00211 #             define BOOST_LIB_RT_OPT "-sgdpn"
00212 #            pragma message("warning: STLPort debug versions are built with /D_STLP_DEBUG=1")
00213 #            error "Build options aren't compatible with pre-built libraries"
00214 #        else
00215 #            define BOOST_LIB_RT_OPT "-spn"
00216 #        endif
00217 
00218 #     else
00219 
00220 #        if defined(_DEBUG)
00221 #             define BOOST_LIB_RT_OPT "-sgd"
00222 #        else
00223 #            define BOOST_LIB_RT_OPT "-s"
00224 #        endif
00225 
00226 #     endif
00227 
00228 #  endif
00229 
00230 #elif defined(__BORLANDC__)
00231 
00232 //
00233 // figure out whether we want the debug builds or not:
00234 //
00235 #pragma defineonoption BOOST_BORLAND_DEBUG -v
00236 //
00237 // sanity check:
00238 //
00239 #if defined(__STL_DEBUG) || defined(_STLP_DEBUG)
00240 #error "Pre-built versions of the Boost libraries are not provided in STLPort-debug form"
00241 #endif
00242 
00243 #  ifdef _RTLDLL
00244 
00245 #     ifdef BOOST_BORLAND_DEBUG
00246 #         define BOOST_LIB_RT_OPT "-d"
00247 #     else
00248 #         define BOOST_LIB_RT_OPT
00249 #     endif
00250 
00251 #  else
00252 
00253 #     ifdef BOOST_BORLAND_DEBUG
00254 #         define BOOST_LIB_RT_OPT "-sd"
00255 #     else
00256 #         define BOOST_LIB_RT_OPT "-s"
00257 #     endif
00258 
00259 #  endif
00260 
00261 #endif
00262 
00263 //
00264 // select linkage opt:
00265 //
00266 #if (defined(_DLL) || defined(_RTLDLL)) && defined(BOOST_DYN_LINK)
00267 #  define BOOST_LIB_PREFIX
00268 #elif defined(BOOST_DYN_LINK)
00269 #  error "Mixing a dll boost library with a static runtime is a really bad idea..."
00270 #else
00271 #  define BOOST_LIB_PREFIX "lib"
00272 #endif
00273 
00274 //
00275 // now include the lib:
00276 //
00277 #if defined(BOOST_LIB_NAME) \
00278       && defined(BOOST_LIB_PREFIX) \
00279       && defined(BOOST_LIB_TOOLSET) \
00280       && defined(BOOST_LIB_THREAD_OPT) \
00281       && defined(BOOST_LIB_RT_OPT) \
00282       && defined(BOOST_LIB_VERSION)
00283 
00284 #  pragma comment(lib, BOOST_LIB_PREFIX BOOST_STRINGIZE(BOOST_LIB_NAME) "-" BOOST_LIB_TOOLSET BOOST_LIB_THREAD_OPT BOOST_LIB_RT_OPT "-" BOOST_LIB_VERSION ".lib")
00285 #ifdef BOOST_LIB_DIAGNOSTIC
00286 #  pragma message ("Linking to lib file: " BOOST_LIB_PREFIX BOOST_STRINGIZE(BOOST_LIB_NAME) "-" BOOST_LIB_TOOLSET BOOST_LIB_THREAD_OPT BOOST_LIB_RT_OPT "-" BOOST_LIB_VERSION ".lib")
00287 #endif
00288 
00289 #else
00290 #  error "some required macros where not defined (internal logic error)."
00291 #endif
00292 
00293 
00294 #endif // _MSC_VER || __BORLANDC__
00295 
00296 //
00297 // finally undef any macros we may have set:
00298 //
00299 #ifdef BOOST_LIB_PREFIX
00300 #  undef BOOST_LIB_PREFIX
00301 #endif
00302 #if defined(BOOST_LIB_NAME)
00303 #  undef BOOST_LIB_NAME
00304 #endif
00305 #if defined(BOOST_LIB_TOOLSET)
00306 #  undef BOOST_LIB_TOOLSET
00307 #endif
00308 #if defined(BOOST_LIB_THREAD_OPT)
00309 #  undef BOOST_LIB_THREAD_OPT
00310 #endif
00311 #if defined(BOOST_LIB_RT_OPT)
00312 #  undef BOOST_LIB_RT_OPT
00313 #endif
00314 #if defined(BOOST_LIB_LINK_OPT)
00315 #  undef BOOST_LIB_LINK_OPT
00316 #endif
00317 #if defined(BOOST_LIB_DEBUG_OPT)
00318 #  undef BOOST_LIB_DEBUG_OPT
00319 #endif
00320 #if defined(BOOST_DYN_LINK)
00321 #  undef BOOST_DYN_LINK
00322 #endif
00323
